column4: hi, just installed ubuntu and when i attemp to boot into ubuntu I get "Kernel panic - not syncing: VFS: Unable to mount root fs on unkown wn-block(0,0) - any ideas how to fix this or why it is happening?

no, but I can get into it
can't get into the command line sorry. only get minimal bash like
